name: Coconut and Tapioca Soup
keywords: appetizer, coconut milk, palm sugar, tapioca pearls, spring
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup palm sugar, or regular sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the coconut milk and 2 cups of water to a boil. Stir in the tapioca, palm sugar, salt and the yam. Reduce the heat to low and simmer until the tapioca becomes translucent, about 20 to 30 minutes. Serve warm, sprinkled with peanuts, in individual bowls.
